title: Contraception

Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Conception
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Contraception
description: Episode of Series "The Facts Are These". The most important aspect of family planning is to avoid the unwanted child. Baroness Birk describes to young people the irresponsibility of creating such a child and the damaging psychological, radical and social effects on both the child and the parents. Advice for young people on all types of sexual matters is provided by Family Planning Association Clinics and Brooke Advisory Centre. An animated sequence on the mechanic of conception is included.
